meanings.definition: Showing great attention to detail or correct behavior
meanings.sent1: She always dresses punctiliously for important meetings, making sure every detail is perfect.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the portrait punctiliously, capturing every feature with precision.
meanings.sent3: The detective examined the crime scene punctiliously, looking for any tiny clue that could solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The architect designed the building punctiliously, ensuring every angle was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the dish punctiliously, garnishing it with intricate details for a stunning presentation.

meanings.definition: Done in a careful and precise manner
meanings.sent1: He completed the task punctiliously, checking each step to avoid any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The watchmaker repaired the antique clock punctiliously, restoring it to perfect working order.
meanings.sent3: The students followed the instructions punctiliously, hoping to get top marks on the assignment.
meanings.sent4: The tailor sewed the dress punctiliously, ensuring every stitch was neat and even.
meanings.sent5: The gardener pruned the bushes punctiliously, shaping them into elegant forms in the garden.
